```
00: right
01: left
02: write
03: create state (0000-FFFF)
04: close state/if statement
05: open if statement (compare 0000-FFFF)
06: run state
07: print (2 chars)
08: print tape
commands are 1 character, arguments are 2
example:
000000020002010000030001050000000000060001040000050001000000060001040000050002010000060002040000040000030002080000050000020001060001040000050001020000010000060002040000040000060001 is a binary counter
```
